analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#173)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in BancorConverter.buy (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#799-831):
	External calls:
	- amount = getPurchaseReturn(_reserveToken,_depositAmount) (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#804-805)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reserves (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#809-813)

Reentrancy in BancorConverter.convert (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#778-791):
	External calls:
	- purchaseAmount = buy(_fromToken,_amount,1) (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#790-791)
	- sell(_toToken,purchaseAmount,_minReturn) (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#791)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reserves (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#791)

Reentrancy in BancorConverter.sell (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#836-875):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_sellAmount <= token.balanceOf(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#841-843)

	- tokenSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#847)
	- reserveBalance = getReserveBalance(_reserveToken) (/unique_chucks/1/0xb626a5facc4de1c813f5293ec3be31979f1d1c78.sol#847-849)
	State variables written after the call(s):
